name: StayUp
tagline: Tools and Support to help you operate Cloud Foundry clusters and keep CF apps running smoothly
body:
### What we do
We build tools and provide support to help your operations team keep your Cloud Foundry platform and the apps on it running smoothly.

![Dashboard of cf-app logs](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/227505/7658399/c7763396-faee-11e4-8676-05c3f4d0e894.png)

### Who we are

![David Laing](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/227505/7658732/74075f3e-faf1-11e4-9549-afb2b36f71f4.png)
David Laing, CEO; StayUp - After 2 years as lead of the Logsearch.io project (ELK + BOSH); he built the logsearch-for-cloudfoundry addon to bring log analysis to CF operators and CF users. 

![Colin Humphreys](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/227505/7658609/7938eb54-faf0-11e4-8cce-f9d61cf88de2.png)
Colin Humphreys, Investor; CloudCredo - Colin has more than fifteen yearsâ€™ experience delivering working solutions and saving failing projects. He is passionate about Cloud Computing, DevOps, Continuous Delivery and PaaS. Colin delivers tooling to the Cloud Foundry community, is a regular speaker on PaaS-related topics, and is a member of Cloud Foundry's Community Advisory Board.
